name: Indus Appstore
description: Indian app marketplace offering localized app discovery in 12+ Indian languages with zero commission on in-app payments. Pre-installed on Xiaomi and Lava smartphones.

opengraph.title: Indus Appstore Home Page | Indus Appstore
opengraph.description: Discover apps and games that you’ll love on the Indus Appstore. Browse in English or 12 local languages for a seamless experience.
